page.title: Netgear Orbi Wall Plug Satellite (RBW30) Gen2

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== <small>'''802.11ac Two-Stream Wave2 WiFi plus Dedicated Two-Stream Wireless Backhaul'''</small>
When compared to the [[Netgear Orbi Wall Plug Satellite (RBW30)]], this updated version has the bluetooth circuitry removed as described in the [https://fccid.io/PY317400403/Letter/Expedited-Review-Approval-Letter-3750404 Expedited Review Approval Letter]. Most of the details for this device are copied from the original RBW30.
<!-- {{FCC ST|08/22/2018}} --> <!-- "U12H340T05 802391 REV.0 GP" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. --> :;[https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk30.aspx Netgear Orbi Kit (RBK30)]: *[[Netgear Orbi Router (RBR40)]] *[[Netgear Orbi Wall Plug Satellite (RBW30)]]
===Product features=== *Dedicated two stream 802.11ac wireless backhaul
==See also== *[[Netgear Orbi Router (RBR50)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Router'' • [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/orbi/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (Dakota) 2x 2T2R, QCA9984 (Cascade) 4T4R AC *[[Netgear Orbi Satellite (RBS50)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Satellite'' • ''Orbi Kit (RBK50)'' :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (Dakota) 2x 2T2R, QCA9984 (Cascade) 4T4R AC *[[Netgear Orbi Router (RBR40)]] - *[[Netgear Orbi Satellite (RBS40)]] - *[[Netgear Orbi Wall Plug Satellite (RBW30)]] - *Netgear Orbi WiFi System ([https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk50.aspx RBK50]) - AC3000 (RBR50 + RBS50) *Netgear Orbi WiFi System ([https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk40.aspx RBK40]) - AC2200 (RBR40 + RBS40) *Netgear Orbi WiFi System ([https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk30.aspx RBK30]) - AC2200 (RBR40 + RBW30)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
